property_sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT 'SetBlockOnCustomer' || '::' || "CustomerBlock"."ID" AS "ID",
       "CustomerBlock"."ID"                             AS "CustomerBlock",
       "Customer"."ID"                                  AS "Customer",
       "CustomerBlock"."CreationTime"                   AS "Time",
       "CustomerBlock"."BlockedBy_ID"                   AS "ExecutedBy",
       "CustomerBlock"."BlockExecutionType"             AS "ExecutionType",
       "CustomerBlock"."BlockType"                      AS "BlockType",
       "CustomerBlock"."FirstBlockReason"               AS "BlockReason"
FROM "o_custom_Customer" AS "Customer"
         LEFT JOIN "o_custom_CustomerBlock" AS "CustomerBlock"
                   ON "Customer"."ID" = "CustomerBlock"."Customer_ID"
WHERE "CustomerBlock"."CreationTime" IS NOT NULL

sql_factory_datasets.sql:
SELECT
	'SetBlockOnCustomer' || '::' || "CustomerBlock"."ID" AS "ID",
	"SalesOrder"."ID" AS "SalesOrder"
FROM "o_custom_CustomerBlock" AS "CustomerBlock"
	LEFT JOIN "o_custom_SalesOrder" AS "SalesOrder"
	    ON "CustomerBlock"."Customer_ID" = "SalesOrder"."Customer_ID"
WHERE "CustomerBlock"."CreationTime" IS NOT NULL
    AND "SalesOrder"."ID" IS NOT NULL
    -- Only inlcude the event if the block was set after the creation of the sales order
    -- as blocks that were active on the customer level when the sales order was created
    -- are typically copied to the sales order.
    AND "CustomerBlock"."CreationTime" >= "SalesOrder"."CreationTime"
